data.text: @DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews I for one hope to never see masks in school again if we can’t get to that point then maybe time to move somewhere where kids lives are valued. If KC & Seattle brings back unnecessary mandates at the slightest uptick then we done.

@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews Folks need to know so they can make the right decisions. As parents of school age children that are getting ready to enroll for next year, I’d like to know how quickly KC will bring back mandates.

@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews So what are the metrics going to be? Does this many ANY uptick in numbers will bring back KC mandates or only if those numbers exceed the CDC guidelines? What dates will be used to assess those trends/baselines is it current dates or those on March 21st?

@issar20 @DocJeffD @CDCgov @CDCDirector That account you just tweeted does not understand statistics, analysis, or math.  Please quit sharing it.  It’s like having your 16 year old algebra student critiquing public health data. That has a “c” in the class.  (Basic concepts).

@ridicuvosity @DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews @choeshow The Washington dates and strategy were published BEFORE the CDC changed their guidelines. You are the misinfo spreader with your false interpretation of data. You don’t understand statistics, analysis, math. @DocJeffD this ridic account is spreading misinfo. Get her a tutorial.

@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews Great no masks starting today. 

Free our children

@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews With all due respect, it is you spreading misinformation. KC is not following CDC guidance. Maybe it will at some point in the future, but it is not now. That's the point.

@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews @choeshow CDC guidance states that KC may drop its mask mandate now, not 3 weeks from now. Until KC drops its mask mandate, they are not following CDC guidance. If KC is in the new category now it should drop the mask mandate now, not 3 weeks from now, regardless of when it was anticipated
@DocJeffD @rrichSEA10 @CDCgov @CDCDirector @GovInslee @KCPubHealth @BrandiKruse @komonews Oh that's rich 😂 You do know that some of us are college educated and literate...right?
